text:
STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK
4*
OFFICE OF THE UNIVERSITY ARCHITECT
February 24, 1958 £/?$
<*
?/«,
University of Illinois
Urbana
Illinois
Attention R, F. Wood, Supervisor of Credit Collections
Gentlemen:
In reply to your letter of February 14, 1956 we wish to advise that
according to our records invoice 10193, and 21554 totaling $7*50 were paid
by New York Check number 958736 dated February 5, 1958#
We understand your invoice #21620 in the amount of $4*50 should be
billed to Education Department, Education Building, Albany, New York,
Vouchers for the Education Department invoice #21620 are being forwarded
to you by that Department,
We would like to request that future billing for subscription to
Education Television Research Fact Sheets be sent to the Education
Department•
As of this date we have no use for this subscription and would ask
that you cancel any subscription of State University of New York as of
December 31, 1957*
If, at any time, in the future we have need of this service we will
resubscribe to Educational Television Research”.
In the event you have no record of receiving the above check for $7*50
we will be pleased to check the endorsement and bank it was deposited in
from the cancelled check in the Comptroller’s office.
Very truly yours.
John H. O’Brien
Purchasing Agent
JHO’B/ep
